data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Valle. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Valle, Honduras
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Valle, Honduras a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Valle, Honduras. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Valle.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Turk people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Valle, Honduras into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Valle, Honduras a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 189,700 people living in Valle, Honduras. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

location.name: Valle
location.cities_list: San Lorenzo, Nacaome, La Alianza, Langue, Agua Fría
location.cities_list_w_pop: San Lorenzo (22,289), Nacaome (13,929), La Alianza (6,923), Langue (3,679), Agua Fría (3,196)
